name: Preparing For A Busy Day
description:
This a short interactive adventure that puts you in the shoes of a man getting ready for work. But today, something feels different, something unexpected is about to happen. As you explore his home and make choices, you'll uncover the truth behind the day's events, leading to a surprising outcome. Find the 4 collectables and learn more about his past.

This game is free, but any donation is highly appreciated. CONTROLS
